//wc: with comment

//Hw5-4-1 I-type testing 
111111111111 00101 000 00110 0010011    //addi x6 x5 -1
000000 000001 00101 001 00111 0010011   //slli x7 x5 1
111111111111 00101 010 01000 0010011    //slti x8 x5 -1
111111111111 00101 011 01001 0010011    //sltui x9 x5 -1
000000000001 00101 100 01010 0010011    //xori x10 x5 1
000000 000001 10000 101 01011 0010011   //srli x11 x16 1
010000 000001 10000 101 01100 0010011   //srai x12 x16 1
000000000010 00101 110 01101 0010011    //ori x13 x5 2
000000000100 00101 111 01110 0010011    //andi x14 x5 4

//Hw5-4-2 R-type testing
0000000 00100 00101 000 00110 0110011   //add x6 x5 x4
0100000 00100 00101 000 00111 0110011   //sub x7 x5 x4
0000000 00010 00101 001 01000 0110011   //sll x8 x5 x2
0000000 00111 00110 010 01001 0110011   //slt x9 x6 x7
0000000 00111 00110 011 01010 0110011   //sltu x10 x6 x7
0000000 01010 01001 100 01011 0110011   //xor x11 x9 x10
0000000 00010 10010 101 01100 0110011   //srl x12 x18 x2
0100000 00010 10010 101 01101 0110011   //sra x13 x18 x2
0000000 01010 00101 110 01110 0110011   //or x14 x5 x10
0000000 01001 00111 111 01111 0110011   //and x15 x7 x9

//Hw5-4-6 Load/Store inst. testing
000000000000 00000 000 00001 0000011 //lb x1 x0 0
000000000010 00000 001 00001 0000011 //lh x1 x0 2
000000000000 00000 010 00001 0000011 //lw x1 x0 0
000000000011 00000 100 00001 0000011 //lbu x1 x0 3
000000000000 00000 101 00001 0000011 //lhu x1 x0 0
//sb x1 x0 0
//sh x1 x0 2
//sw x1 x0 0

//Hw5-4-8 B-type testing
0000000 00001 00001 000 11000 1100011 //beq x1 x1 24
0000000 00001 00001 001 10100 1100011 //bne x1 x1 20
0000000 00001 00001 100 10000 1100011 //blt x1 x2 16
0000000 00001 00001 101 01100 1100011 //bge x1 x0 12
0000000 00001 00001 110 01000 1100011 //bltu x1 x1 8
0000000 00001 00001 111 00100 1100011 //bgeu x1 x1 4

//Hw5-4-9 J-type testing
000000000000 00101 000 00000 1101111  //jal x0 30
000000010000 00100 000 00000 1100111 //jalr x0 x4 16
